name: Nordavind
description:
Nordavind is a playful game starring René, a child living in wintery rural Norway. Using the snowy environment, you have to traverse a world ridden with challenges and monsters, and reclaim your lost teddy bear from the evil snowman. 

Credits: 

  • Dexter André Osiander - Project manager, programmer
  • Ole Marius Andersen - Creative director, 3D generalist, sound effects
  • Ingvild Grotløkken - Art director, 2D art, visual effects
  • Victoria Heide Meyer Simonsen - Animation, public relations
  • Eirik Gjeruldsen - Programming
  • Jakub Rymsza - Game design, level design
  • Robert Sørensen - Music
